blademaster:DancersAmulet.NAME: Dancer's Amulet
blademaster:DancersAmulet.FLAVOR: A mildly special amulet, I suppose.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 3 cards in a single turn, draw 1 card.

blademaster:RandomBladePerk.NAME: Perk: Blades
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, channel #b1 random #yBlade.

blademaster:RandomDefensiveStancePerk.NAME: Perk: Defensive Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, switch your #yDefensive #yStance to a random #yStance.

blademaster:RandomStancePerk.NAME: Perk: Offensive Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, switch your #yStance to a random #yStance.

blademaster:FinisherDrawCardPerk.NAME: Perk: Finisher Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #rFinisher, draw 1 card.

blademaster:StanceHealPerk.NAME: Perk: Healthy Stances
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat,heal #b6 HP if you're in a Stance.

blademaster:ComboEveryTurnPerk.NAME: Perk: Alacrity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #yCombo.

blademaster:FuryEveryTurnPerk.NAME: Perk: Endless Rage
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b5 #yFury.

blademaster:OnAttackedChargePerk.NAME: Perk: Hypercharge
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you're attacked, if you're in a #yStance, gain #b1 #yCharge.

blademaster:WindChargePerk.NAME: Perk: Wind Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you're in #gWind #gStance gain #b3 #gWind #gCharges if you have none. Otherwise, gain #b1 #gWind #gCharge.

blademaster:LightningChargePerk.NAME: Perk: Lightning Stance Mastery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you're in #bLightning #bStance gain #b3 #bLightning #bCharges if you have none. Otherwise, gain #b1 #bLightning #bCharge.

blademaster:BleedingMoreDamagePerk.NAME: Perk: Deep Cuts
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBleeding enemies take #b30% more damage rather than #b20%.
